title: Correlation analysis of database data based on the throughput coefficient
abstract: The data in the database with correlation is frequently separated into distinct data tables, making it difficult to query the target variable data of interest to users while also locating the correlated variable data. The throughput coefficient is used to propose a correlation analysis of database data in this research. The data of selected variables is first pre-processed, after which each variable is assessed using the pass-through coefficient and the corresponding variable association table is created in the database; finally, the method's practicality is tested by putting it into action on a web page. This research presents a novel approach to increasing the efficiency of database queries.
tldr_ja: 本研究では、データベース内の相関データを効率的に分析するために、スループット係数を用いた新しい手法を提案します。選択した変数の前処理を行い、各変数をスループット係数で評価し、相関変数の関連テーブルを作成します。最終的に、この手法の実用性をウェブページで検証し、データベースクエリの効率向上を目指します。
